venue.name: Upper Slatersville Reservoir Boat Ramp Parking Lot

item.description:
In this photo tour of Northern RI lakes we will hope to capture some great landscape shots that include foliage an possible fog or reflections on the water.

We will meet at the Slatersville Res. boat ramp on Rt. 102 near Wrights Farm Restaurant and then car pool around to the other lakes.  Which may include:

Slatersville Res.

Smith & Sales Res.

Wilson's Res.

Round Top Pond

Harrisville Pond (not sure of the name)

Echo lake

Bowdish Res.

We will try to visit as many of these as we can while the light is still good but I would expect this to take 2-3 hours.

It would be a good idea to have a tripod for this shoot and possibly a wide to mid-range lens (14 - 20 mm range) but any lens could work fine.

This is new type event for this group in which I'm offering a very inexpensive group shoot where we can all learn from each other.  However, for these to be worthwhile I will set a high limit for them to run.  Also I won't have a curriculum to teach you but asking questions will be fine.  For this event to run we need at least 10 people to register.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for a silver mini van with black cargo top.
item.name: Field Trip: Lakes of Northern RI Photo Tour
